brainly_data.question:
Q. What is the difference between morphology and anatomy.

Plz. ans it asap.
brainly_data.subject: Biology

all_answers.question:
Q. What is the difference between morphology and anatomy.

Plz. ans it asap.
all_answers.subject: Biology
all_answers.text: Morphology is the study of the structure of the human body in connection with its development and vital activity; it includes human anatomy, embryology, and histology. While anatomy is the study of organs, their topography and structure but not at microscopic level
